name: Lupan
shortDescription: A social RPG where you create your own character, complete quests, manage needs, and influence the game's future through community votes.
fullDescription: Lupan is a community-driven mobile RPG where you live, explore, and grow as your own custom character. Complete quests, manage health and hunger, and shape the world by voting on new features at the Town Hall. Invite friends, earn rewards, and enjoy a blend of life simulation and RPG adventure.
